question:
[Robert] has a aunt named [Mary], routinely he went to school with his aunt [Robert] and his brother [Carolyn] were grilling hamburgers outside. [Julie], [Robert]'s mother, came out to bring them cold sweet tea. [Ellen], who is the sister of [Carolyn], is a lovely girl. [Robert] and his son [Roger] went to look at cars. [Robert] ended up buying the Mustang. [Ellen] went to her father [Roger] Birthday party [Carolyn] wanted to play basketball with her brother [Robert]. [Robert] asked his mom, [Julie] if they could go outside.
Question: How is [Mary] related to [Carolyn]?

Step 3: Analyze the relationships to infer the relationship between [Mary] and [Carolyn]:

Based on the information provided in the story, we can infer that [Mary] is the aunt of [Carolyn] through her relationship with [Robert].
